localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The joyful card platform âœ¨ Teamo has everything you need to create delightful group cards for any occasion with fun messages, photos, and loopy GIFs. Customizable, schedulable, and perfect for collaboration ğŸ’› ğŸ‰
nodes.title: Teamo 2.0 - Designed for the group, built for the celebration
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
nodes.title: Google Fonts Icons - Google Fonts now supports icons
nodes.author: David Haddad

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
nodes.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games
nodes.author: Dean Eigenmann

nodes.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
nodes.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys
nodes.author: Sam Straun

nodes.excerpt: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
nodes.title: Pastimes - Find friends who do your favorite activities
nodes.author: Forest Good

nodes.excerpt: On Deck is awesome, but it costs both time and money. Browse Fellows from across cohorts, and book a 1:1 with them for free. They'll help you figure out if the program is a fit for you and your lifestyle.
nodes.title: HelloFellow - Free chats with On Deck fellows
nodes.author: Chez Spigelman

nodes.excerpt: Neuro gives you access to a network of GPUs with a single API call. Get instant MLOps. â˜ï¸ Serverless compute âš–ï¸ Only pay for the compute used = no more 24/7 hosting fees! âš¡ï¸ Go from prototype to production +10x faster. Check it out at https://www.getneuro.ai/
nodes.title: Neuro - Instant infrastructure for machine learning
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
nodes.title: Quadrant Eye - Renew your glasses and contact lens RX from your couch
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
nodes.title: DrillRoom - AI-powered billiard training & stats
nodes.author: Gabriel LÃ³pez

nodes.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate investment analysis tool, which helps you to find and to analyze the best investment opportunities nearby.
nodes.title: DataMool - Predictive property investment opportunities. Worldwide.
nodes.author: Mark Harris

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

nodes.excerpt: Kafkai is a machine-learning algorithm writes articles from scratch. There is no scraping or spinning happening in the background. It allows you to get unique content for cents instead of dollars. It's perfect for bulk content production that SEOs require.
nodes.title: Kafkai 2.0 - Unique and readable content generated by AI
nodes.author: Dejan Murko

nodes.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. â € It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! ğŸš€
nodes.title: Vidjet - Popup-video player for websites
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: The priorities of workers are shifting. Unito compiled this toolkit to help kickstart your companyâ€™s growth in four important areas: remote work and flexible scheduling, diversity and inclusion, career growth and compensation, transparency and alignment.
nodes.title: The Better Workplace Toolkit  - Resources to help you meet the evolving needs of your team
nodes.author: Evan LePage

nodes.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
nodes.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work
nodes.author: Garry Tan

nodes.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
nodes.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox
nodes.author: Harry Qi

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
nodes.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious
nodes.author: Tom Galea

nodes.excerpt: A small app for making quick flowcharts from text â¿».
nodes.title: flowchart.fun - An open-source tool for generating flowcharts from text
nodes.author: Mehmet Akyol

nodes.excerpt: pNeura is a platform that enables entrepreneurs to share their progress and connect with other entrepreneurs and investors. Investors can follow their portfolios with ease. Developed by Appello Software.
nodes.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS
nodes.author: Michelle Badenhorst

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
nodes.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
nodes.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp
nodes.author: Petr Filipchyk

nodes.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
nodes.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse
nodes.author: Vahe Hovhannisyan

nodes.excerpt: Sprint Poker is an intuitive, lightweight estimation tool that fits into your existing Jira workflow. ğŸ—³ï¸ Estimates that sync back to Jira automagically ğŸƒ Interactive cards and custom estimation scales â° Async friendly for distributed teams
nodes.title: Sprint Poker by Parabol - Remotely bring planning poker to life
nodes.author: Jordan Husney

nodes.title: FundBoard - Build a tailor-fit list of startup investors in minutes

nodes.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
nodes.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students
nodes.author: Derrick McMillen
